&lt;p style=&quot;background-repeat: no-repeat; background-image: url(&amp;quot;data:image/png;base64,&amp;quot;); background-position: 672px 0px;&quot;&gt;&lt;b&gt;Spoilers for previous episodes!&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/p&gt;The story of corruption and war within the ICA is not a new one. More than one of the previous Hitman games are based around Agent 47 working against or outside of the agency, and the &lt;i style=&quot;background-repeat: no-repeat; background-image: url(&amp;quot;data:image/png;base64,&amp;quot;); background-position: 672px 0px;&quot;&gt;Enemy Within&lt;/i&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;background-repeat: no-repeat; background-image: url(&amp;quot;data:image/png;base64,&amp;quot;); background-position: 672px 0px;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;novel lists multiple figures on the board of directors who are clearly involved in illegal or immoral practices. But with the introduction of Providence, the Hitman universe&#039;s very own Illuminati, this story is quite different.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;background-repeat: no-repeat; background-image: url(&amp;quot;data:image/png;base64,&amp;quot;); background-position: 672px 0px;&quot;&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Erich Soders, the director of the ICA is admitted to the GAMA hospital for heart surgery he cannot afford. 47&#039;s handler Diana believes this is only possible due to Providence, and deduces that Soders is the mole in the ICA. After consultation with the board, Soders is marked for assassination along with Yuki Yamazaki, another Providence member.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;background-repeat: no-repeat; background-image: url(&amp;quot;data:image/png;base64,&amp;quot;); background-position: 672px 0px;&quot;&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style=&quot;background-repeat: no-repeat; background-image: url(&amp;quot;data:image/png;base64,&amp;quot;); background-position: 672px 0px;&quot;&gt;Episode 6 takes the semi-formed story from the previous 5 episodes and turns it into something intriguing, especially with the help of the final cutscene.&amp;nbsp;&lt;span style=&quot;background-repeat: no-repeat; background-image: url(&amp;quot;data:image/png;base64,&amp;quot;); background-position: 672px 0px;&quot;&gt;To reveal much more would be a disservice to the incredible plot.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
